de.braintags.io.vertx.pojomapper.annotation

Annotation Type Entity


  • @Documented
 @Inherited
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface Entity
    The annotation defines a class to be a mappable instance and allows to give further information about the entity inside the used datastore ( database table, column in mongo or others ). All classes, which shall be mapped into a datastore must have this annotation

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Fields and Description
      static java.lang.String UNDEFINED_NAME 

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.String name
      Defines the name of the entity inside the datastore.
      EntityOption[] options
      Define some specific options, which can be interpreted by the implementation of the IDataStore

    • Field Detail

      • UNDEFINED_NAME

        public static final java.lang.String UNDEFINED_NAME

    • Element Detail

      • name

        public abstract java.lang.String name
        Defines the name of the entity inside the datastore. Default is an UNDEFINED_NAME, which will lead to the simple name of the class
        Returns:
        Default:
        ""

      • options

        public abstract EntityOption[] options
        Define some specific options, which can be interpreted by the implementation of the IDataStore
        Returns:
        Default:
        {}
